translations: n.[建]对接；边界；用头撞人（犯规动作）
v.[建]对接（butt 的 ing 形式）；冲撞；抵触

phrs.translation: [美国口语]彻底地，完全；狠狠地；有力地；毫无疑问

sentences.sentence: How can I explain if you keep butting in?
sentences.translation: 你一直插嘴，我还怎么解释？

sentences.sentence: Lawrence kept on butting me but the referee did not warn him.
sentences.translation: 劳伦斯不断用头撞我，可裁判没有警告他。

sentences.sentence: head-butting a referee who asked him to take a drugs test;
sentences.translation: 用头顶撞让他做药物测试的裁判；
